0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, NEWS REPORTS ON THE PRESENCE OF ONE HUNDRED JIHADISTS IN MINDANAO AND  LAY DOWN TACTICAL MEASURE TO UPHOLD NATIONAL SECURITY UPON VERIFYING THE SAME
